name: to_tdigest
description: Converts an untyped histogram to a TDigest, assuming the values are centroids.

params.name: field
params.description: The histogram value to be converted

params.name: field
params.description: The histogram value to be converted

examples:
FROM histogram_standard_index
 | WHERE instance == "hand-rolled"
 | EVAL tdigest = to_tdigest(responseTime)
 | KEEP responseTime, tdigest
;
